mapper.select: SELECT M.MENU_NM AS STAT_LABEL, M.MENU_KEY AS MENU_KEY, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_MENU_STAT_${ym} S WHERE S.MENU_KEY IN ( SELECT MENU_KEY FROM TB_MENU START WITH MENU_KEY = M.MENU_KEY CONNECT BY PRIOR MENU_KEY = PKEY ) ) AS STAT_DATA FROM TB_MENU M WHERE M.MENU_TYP = #{menuTyp} AND M.NAVI_FLG = 'Y' AND M.ACT_FLG = 'Y' AND M.PKEY = 0 ORDER BY M.FKEY ASC

SELECT M.MENU_NM AS STAT_LABEL, M.MENU_KEY AS MENU_KEY, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_MENU_STAT_${ym} S WHERE S.MENU_KEY IN ( SELECT MENU_KEY FROM TB_MENU START WITH MENU_KEY = M.MENU_KEY CONNECT BY PRIOR MENU_KEY = PKEY ) ) AS STAT_DATA FROM TB_MENU M WHERE M.MENU_TYP = #{menuTyp} AND M.PKEY = #{mnKey} AND M.ACT_FLG = 'Y' ORDER BY M.OKEY ASC
SELECT * from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS IC WHERE IC.TABLE_NAME = #{tableNm}
